## Problem 1: Birthday Function 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
sim_regression = function(n) {
  
  sim_data = 
    tibble(
      x = rnorm(n, mean = 1, sd = 1),
      y = 2 + 3 * x + rnorm(n, 0, 1)
    )

  lm_fit = lm(y ~ x, data = sim_data)

  out_df = 
    tibble(
      beta0_hat = coef(lm_fit)[1], 
      beta1_hat = coef(lm_fit)[2] 
    )
  
  return(out_df)}

sim_res = 
  expand_grid(
    sample_size = c(2:50), 
    iter = 1:1000
  ) |> 
  mutate(lm_res = map(sample_size, sim_regression)) |> 
  unnest(lm_res)


sim_res |> 
  filter(sample_size == 30) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = beta0_hat, y = beta1_hat)) + #there is a string negative correlation between the intercept and the slope. 
  geom_point()

```
